short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: calculate in real-time the days remaining until Christmas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate the holiday season with a festive touch right in your browser! Introducing "Christmas Countdown Timer," a delightful Chrome extension that brings the magic of Christmas to your daily online experience. As the days get colder and the holiday spirit fills the air, our extension offers a joyful and heartwarming way to count down to the most wonderful time of the year - Christmas Day!
